title: build: short mode tests take too long
body:
These tests take too long (> 0.5s on an old Mac Mini with 4GB RAM):

# Testing packages.
ok  	cmd/fix	2.474s
ok  	compress/flate	3.579s
ok  	crypto/x509	0.690s
ok  	encoding/gob	0.635s
ok  	exp/norm	1.486s
ok  	math/big	1.130s
ok  	net	5.860s
ok  	net/http	7.577s
ok  	net/http/cgi	1.307s
ok  	old/netchan	1.304s
ok  	os/exec	0.542s
ok  	runtime	2.216s
ok  	time	4.952s

# runtime -cpu=1,2,4
ok  	runtime	5.998s

# sync -cpu=10
ok  	sync	0.614s
